title: Design homepage
description: Create a modern, responsive, and user-friendly design for the homepage, ensuring it aligns with brand guidelines and enhances user experience.

title: Fix login bug
description: Investigate and resolve the issue preventing users from logging in with their Google accounts, including testing on multiple devices and browsers.

title: Update privacy policy
description: Revise the privacy policy to ensure GDPR compliance and update it with the latest legal requirements, clearly outlining data usage practices.

title: Implement search feature
description: Add an advanced search functionality to the product catalog that allows filtering by category, price, and ratings, improving user navigation.

title: Email notification setup
description: Set up automated email notifications for new orders, shipping updates, and customer confirmations to improve communication and user satisfaction.

title: Mobile app testing
description: Conduct comprehensive testing on Android and iOS apps, including UI/UX testing, performance evaluation, and bug reporting for app stability.

title: SEO optimization
description: Optimize website content, meta tags, and images to improve search engine rankings and drive more organic traffic to the website.

title: Database backup
description: Create automated daily backups of the database and ensure they are securely stored and easily retrievable for disaster recovery purposes.

title: User profile page
description: Redesign the user profile page to include enhanced features such as profile picture upload, activity history, and personalized settings.

title: Payment gateway integration
description: Integrate Stripe payment gateway to allow secure credit card and digital wallet payments, including error handling and transaction logging.

title: Bug fix: cart issues
description: Identify and fix issues causing problems when adding items to the shopping cart, ensuring smooth checkout experience across devices.

title: Analytics setup
description: Set up Google Analytics tracking for the new website, including conversion goals, event tracking, and generating performance reports for stakeholders.

title: Newsletter design
description: Design an engaging and responsive newsletter template for marketing campaigns, ensuring compatibility with major email clients.

title: Server upgrade
description: Upgrade server RAM and storage to handle increased traffic and improve website performance, including downtime planning and testing.

title: Social media campaign
description: Launch a social media campaign on Facebook and Instagram, including content creation, scheduling posts, and monitoring engagement metrics.
